Dans cette scène où Prot prétend venir d'une autre planète au moyen d'un rayon de lumière, on a choisi une gare comme Grand Central en raison des changements de lumière incessants. On voit ainsi les rayons de lumière comme des phénomènes naturels et parfois avec un effet surnaturel ou magique.

The idea, really, in the scene  where the character Prot claims to be  arriving from another planet on a beam of light  was to choose a location such as a railway station  such as Grand Central Station in particular, where  the light falls in pools and changes, so that  it's possible sometimes to see the beams of light as natural phenomena  or to see them as something that might be otherworldly or supernatural  or magical.
On voit un ancien combattant de la guerre du Vietnam, qui lui, évidemment, croit que Prot vient d'une autre planète et croit à son histoire.
In this scene we have the character of the Vietnam vet  who is obviously a believer  that Prot has come from somewhere else and actually believes what he's saying.

Une autre petite touche ajouté plus tard: Jeff devait juste regarder les lunettes, mais j'aime le fait qu'il regarde à travers elles, en se demandant à quoi le monde ressemble à travers les lunettes de Prot.

Another little touch that was added later on was, Jeff actually  used to just look at the glasses, but I like that he comes down and looks through them  wondering what the world really does look like through Prot's glasses.
